org.jukito

Class TestScope

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jukito.TestScope

  • public class TestScope
extends Object
    Container of the SINGLETON and EAGER_SINGLETON scopes for test cases running with the JukitoRunner. Depends on mockito.

    Depends on Mockito.

    Author:
    Philippe Beaudoin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static org.jukito.TestScope.Singleton EAGER_SINGLETON
      Eager test-scoped singleton are similar to test-scoped SINGLETON but they get instantiated automatically with each new test.
      static org.jukito.TestScope.Singleton SINGLETON
      Test-scoped singletons are typically used in test cases for objects that correspond to singletons in the application.

    • Constructor Summary

      TestScope()

      static void clear()
      Clears all the instances of test-scoped singletons.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • SINGLETON

        public static final org.jukito.TestScope.Singleton SINGLETON
        Test-scoped singletons are typically used in test cases for objects that correspond to singletons in the application. Your JUnit test case must use JukitoRunner on its @RunWith annotation so that test-scoped singletons are reset before every test case.

        If you want your singleton to be instantiated automatically with each new test, use EAGER_SINGLETON.

      • EAGER_SINGLETON

        public static final org.jukito.TestScope.Singleton EAGER_SINGLETON
        Eager test-scoped singleton are similar to test-scoped SINGLETON but they get instantiated automatically with each new test.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestScope

        public TestScope()

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Clears all the instances of test-scoped singletons. After this method is called, any "singleton" bound to this scope that had already been created will be created again next time it gets injected.
